verses.verse: נָ֣סוּ <S%H5127><s%> flee וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> no רֹדֵ֣ף <S%H7291><s%> when no man pursueth רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> The wicked וְ֝צַדִּיקִ֗ים <S%H6662><s%> but the righteous כִּכְפִ֥יר <S%H3715><s%> as a lion יִבְטָֽח׃ <S%H982><s%> are bold

בְּפֶ֣שַֽׁע <S%H6588><s%> For the transgression אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of a land רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> many שָׂרֶ֑יהָ <S%H8269><s%> [are] the princes וּבְאָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> thereof but by a man מֵבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> of understanding יֹ֝דֵ֗עַ <S%H3045><s%> [and] knowledge כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> the state יַאֲרִֽיךְ׃ <S%H748><s%> [thereof] shall be prolonged

גֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> man רָ֭שׁ <S%H7326><s%> A poor וְעֹשֵׁ֣ק <S%H6231><s%> that oppresseth דַּלִּ֑ים <S%H1800><s%> the poor מָטָ֥ר <S%H4306><s%> rain סֹ֝חֵ֗ף <S%H5502><s%> [is like] a sweeping וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> leaves לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> which leaveth no food

עֹזְבֵ֣י <S%H5800><s%> They that forsake ת֭וֹרָה <S%H8451><s%> the law יְהַֽלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> praise רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked וְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> but such as keep ת֝וֹרָ֗ה <S%H8451><s%> the law יִתְגָּ֥רוּ <S%H1624><s%> contend בָֽם׃ פ

אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H582><s%> men רָ֭ע <S%H7451><s%> Evil לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָבִ֣ינוּ <S%H995><s%> understand מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> not judgment וּמְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <S%H1245><s%> but they that seek יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God יָבִ֥ינוּ <S%H995><s%> understand כֹֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

טֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> Better רָ֭שׁ <S%H7326><s%> [is] the poor הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that walketh בְּתֻמּ֑וֹ <S%H8537><s%> in his uprightness מֵעִקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H6141><s%> than [he that is] perverse דְּ֝רָכַ֗יִם <S%H1870><s%> [in his] ways וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עָשִֽׁיר׃ <S%H6223><s%> though he [be] rich

נוֹצֵ֣ר <S%H5341><s%> Whoso keepeth תּ֭וֹרָה <S%H8451><s%> the law בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> son מֵבִ֑ין <S%H995><s%> [is] a wise וְרֹעֶה <S%H7462><s%> but he that is a companion זֽ֝וֹלְלִ֗ים <S%H2151><s%> of riotous יַכְלִ֥ים <S%H3637><s%> [men] shameth אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

מַרְבֶּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> increaseth ה֭וֹנוֹ <S%H1952><s%> his substance בְּנֶ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> He that by usury [וּבְתַרְבִּית כ] (וְתַרְבִּ֑ית <S%H8636><s%> increase ק) לְחוֹנֵ֖ן <S%H2603><s%> it for him that will pity דַּלִּ֣ים <S%H1800><s%> the poor יִקְבְּצֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H6908><s%> he shall gather

מֵסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> He that turneth away אָ֭זְנוֹ <S%H241><s%> his ear מִשְּׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> from hearing תּוֹרָ֑ה <S%H8451><s%> the law גַּֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even תְּ֝פִלָּת֗וֹ <S%H8605><s%> even his prayer תּוֹעֵבָֽה׃ <S%H8441><s%> [shall be] abomination

מַשְׁגֶּ֤ה <S%H7686><s%> to go astray יְשָׁרִ֨ים ׀ <S%H3477><s%> Whoso causeth the righteous בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way רָ֗ע <S%H7451><s%> in an evil בִּשְׁחוּת֥וֹ <S%H7816><s%> himself into his own pit הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> will himself יִפּ֑וֹל <S%H5307><s%> he shall fall וּ֝תְמִימִ֗ים <S%H8549><s%> but the upright יִנְחֲלוּ־ <S%H5157><s%> [things] in possession טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> shall have good

חָכָ֣ם <S%H2450><s%> [is] wise בְּ֭עֵינָיו <S%H5869><s%> in his own conceit אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man עָשִׁ֑יר <S%H6223><s%> The rich וְדַ֖ל <S%H1800><s%> but the poor מֵבִ֣ין <S%H995><s%> that hath understanding יַחְקְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H2713><s%> searcheth him out

בַּעֲלֹ֣ץ <S%H5970><s%> [men] do rejoice צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> When righteous רַבָּ֣ה <S%H7227><s%> [there is] great תִפְאָ֑רֶת <S%H8597><s%> glory וּבְק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> rise רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> but when the wicked יְחֻפַּ֥שׂ <S%H2664><s%> is hidden אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> a man

מְכַסֶּ֣ה <S%H3680><s%> He that covereth פְ֭שָׁעָיו <S%H6588><s%> his sins לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יַצְלִ֑יחַ <S%H6743><s%> shall not prosper וּמוֹדֶ֖ה <S%H3034><s%> but whoso confesseth וְעֹזֵ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> and forsaketh יְרֻחָֽם׃ <S%H7355><s%> [them] shall have mercy

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> Happy אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> [is] the man מְפַחֵ֣ד <S%H6342><s%> that feareth תָּמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> alway וּמַקְשֶׁ֥ה <S%H7185><s%> but he that hardeneth לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> his heart יִפּ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall בְּרָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> into mischief

אֲרִי־ <S%H738><s%> lion נֹ֭הֵם <S%H5098><s%> [As] a roaring וְדֹ֣ב <S%H1677><s%> bear שׁוֹקֵ֑ק <S%H8264><s%> and a ranging מֹשֵׁ֥ל <S%H4910><s%> ruler רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> [so is] a wicked עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> over עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people דָּֽל׃ <S%H1800><s%> over the poor

נָגִ֗יד <S%H5057><s%> The prince חֲסַ֣ר <S%H2638><s%> that wanteth תְּ֭בוּנוֹת <S%H8394><s%> understanding וְרַ֥ב <S%H7227><s%> [is] also a great מַעֲשַׁקּ֑וֹת <S%H4642><s%> oppressor [שֹׂנְאֵי כ] (שֹׂ֥נֵא <S%H8130><s%> enemy ק) בֶ֝֗צַע <S%H1215><s%> covetousness יַאֲרִ֥יךְ <S%H748><s%> shall prolong יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> [his] days פ

אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> A man עָשֻׁ֣ק <S%H6231><s%> that doeth violence בְּדַם־ <S%H1818><s%> to the blood נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> of [any] person עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בּ֥וֹר <S%H953><s%> to the pit יָ֝נ֗וּס <S%H5127><s%> shall flee אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no יִתְמְכוּ־ <S%H8551><s%> let no man stay בֽוֹ׃

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Whoso walketh תָּ֭מִים <S%H8549><s%> uprightly יִוָּשֵׁ֑עַ <S%H3467><s%> shall be saved וְנֶעְקַ֥שׁ <S%H6140><s%> but [he that is] perverse דְּ֝רָכַ֗יִם <S%H1870><s%> [in his] ways יִפּ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall בְּאֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> at once

עֹבֵ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> He that tilleth אַ֭דְמָתוֹ <S%H127><s%> his land יִֽשְׂבַּֽע־ <S%H7646><s%> shall have plenty לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread וּמְרַדֵּ֥ף <S%H7291><s%> but he that followeth רֵ֝קִ֗ים <S%H7386><s%> after vain יִֽשְׂבַּֽע־ <S%H7646><s%> plenty רִֽישׁ׃ <S%H7389><s%> [persons] shall have poverty enough

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֱ֭מוּנוֹת <S%H530><s%> A faithful רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> shall abound בְּרָכ֑וֹת <S%H1293><s%> with blessings וְאָ֥ץ <S%H213><s%> but he that maketh haste לְ֝הַעֲשִׁ֗יר <S%H6238><s%> to be rich לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִנָּקֶֽה׃ <S%H5352><s%> shall not be innocent

הַֽכֵּר־ <S%H5234><s%> To have respect פָּנִ֥ים <S%H6440><s%> of persons לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] not good וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Because פַּת־ <S%H6595><s%> for for a piece לֶ֝֗חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread יִפְשַׁע־ <S%H6586><s%> will transgress גָּֽבֶר׃ <S%H1397><s%> [that] man

נִֽבֳהָ֥ל <S%H926><s%> that hasteth לַה֗וֹן <S%H1952><s%> to be rich אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> He רַ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> [hath] an evil עָ֑יִן <S%H5869><s%> eye וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and does not יֵ֝דַע <S%H3045><s%> and considereth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that חֶ֥סֶר <S%H2639><s%> not that poverty יְבֹאֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> shall come

מ֘וֹכִ֤יחַ <S%H3198><s%> He that rebuketh אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> a man אַ֭חֲרַי <S%H310><s%> afterwards חֵ֣ן <S%H2580><s%> more favour יִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> shall find מִֽמַּחֲלִ֥יק <S%H2505><s%> than he that flattereth לָשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H3956><s%> with the tongue

גּוֹזֵ֤ל ׀ <S%H1497><s%> Whoso robbeth אָ֘בִ֤יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאִמּ֗וֹ <S%H517><s%> or his mother וְאֹמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> and saith אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> is not פָּ֑שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> [It is] no transgression חָבֵ֥ר <S%H2270><s%> the same [is] the companion ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of a man מַשְׁחִֽית׃ <S%H7843><s%> destroys

רְחַב־ <S%H7342><s%> He that is of a proud נֶ֭פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> heart יְגָרֶ֣ה <S%H1624><s%> stirreth up מָד֑וֹן <S%H4066><s%> strife וּבוֹטֵ֖חַ <S%H982><s%> but he that putteth his trust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD יְדֻשָּֽׁן׃ <S%H1878><s%> shall be made fat

בּוֹטֵ֣חַ <S%H982><s%> He that trusteth בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his own heart ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כְסִ֑יל <S%H3684><s%> is a fool וְהוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> but whoso walketh בְּ֝חָכְמָ֗ה <S%H2451><s%> wisely ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִמָּלֵֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> he shall be delivered

נוֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> He that giveth לָ֭רָשׁ <S%H7326><s%> unto the poor אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> will never מַחְס֑וֹר <S%H4270><s%> shall not lack וּמַעְלִ֥ים <S%H5956><s%> but he that hideth עֵ֝ינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> shall have many מְאֵרֽוֹת׃ <S%H3994><s%> a curse

בְּק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> rise רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> When the wicked יִסָּתֵ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> hide אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> men וּ֝בְאָבְדָ֗ם <S%H6><s%> themselves but when they perish יִרְבּ֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> increase צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <S%H6662><s%> the righteous
